title: Look at this comp, isn't it neat?
body:
Wouldn't you think my victory complete?
Wouldn't you think I'm the girl
The girl who has every win?

Look at this screen
Victories sheen
How many wonders can one person seen?
Lookin' around here you'd think
Sure
She's got everything

I've got 1337 scores and sight stones of plenty
I've got assists and win rates galore
You want victory streaks?
I got twenty
But who cares?
No big deal
I want more

I wanna be where the big fish are
I wanna be, wanna bm winning'
Struttin' around on those—what do ya' call 'em?—oh, fans.

Flippin' your friends you don't get too far
Legs are required for liftin', carryn'
Strollin' along down a—what's that word again?–streak.

Up where they praise
Up where they won
Up where they stay all day in the sun
One of elite
Wish I could be
Part of that league

What would I give
If I could live
Out of these elos?
What would I pay
To spend a day
Bright in the light?
Bet ya on sight
They're full of delight
Bet they don't reprimand their supports
Bright young humans
Sick of losing
Ready to win

And I'm ready to know what the top pros know
Ask 'em my questions
And get some answers
What's a fire and why does it—what's the word?—burn?

When's it my turn?
Wouldn't I love
Love to explore that league up above?
One of the elite
Wish I could be
Part of that league

One of the elite
Wish I could be
Part of your league

http://orig06.deviantart.net/166f/f/2013/221/d/8/nami_little_mermaid2_by_neonyal-d6hf5jo.png

replies.body: Now this is a good post, not just those stupid gifs, THIS TAKES EFFORT AND IS BEAUTIFUL

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rRuL2Mfd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-20T18:10:21.729+0000)
>
> Now this is a good post, not just those stupid gifs, THIS TAKES EFFORT AND IS BEAUTIFUL

I would record a singing version of it but I am not confident in my voice or want to annoy my neighbors.

https://media.giphy.com/media/wErJXg1tIgHXG/giphy.gif

JUST DO IT

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rRuL2Mfd,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-06-20T20:17:29.543+0000)
>
> https://media.giphy.com/media/wErJXg1tIgHXG/giphy.gif
> 
> JUST DO IT

Ok, but I won't release the recording just yet, I need to practice a lot to at least achieve mediocrity ~~and also gain the confidence to sing in an apartment building without caring what my neighbors think~~

You can do it!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

^This!
{{summoner:30}}
And now all I'm picturing is the girl from Coyote Ugly being all shy singing in her apartment lol.

Wanna know what it sounds like when someone sings it? :D
(I messed up at one part, annnnd it's not like I'm an exceptional singer so uh, you have been warned)
http://vocaroo.com/i/s1rxAyQHPOUX

It's actually pretty cool of you to share your take on the song. :D

You sound a lot like LillyPichu.
I kinda.. Like your voice? xD Hey if you aren't getting lessons already, being a singer myself  I highly recommend them for everyone. Who knows? :)
http://www.hondagrom.net/forums/attachments/5225d1382630108-pushing-4th-gear-over-9-000-rpm-9000techno.gif
http://pre13.deviantart.net/2489/th/pre/f/2014/169/9/a/league_of_legends_x_dbz__it_s_over_9000__by_kittyconqueso-d7my8p9.jpg
Oh How Do You Meta... life in plat... is a mess

>
> Oh How Do You Meta... life in plat... is a mess

Life in ranked:

http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/at-least-you-tried.jpg

NOW GASTON

AND MULAN YES MULAN PLEASE

{{champion:86}} :
Who does she think she is?
That girl has tangled with the wrong man!
{{champion:79}} :
Darn right.
{{champion:86}}:
No one says "no" to Garen!
Dismissed! Rejected!
Publicly humiliated! Why, it's more than I can bear.
{{champion:79}}:
More beer?
{{champion:86}}:
What for? Nothing helps. I'm disgraced.
{{champion:79}}:
Who, you? Never! Garen, you've got to pull yourself together.
{{champion:79}}:
Gosh it disturbs me to see you, Garen
Looking so down in the dumps
Every guy here'd love to be you, Garen
Even when taking your lumps
There's no man in town as admired as you
You're everyone's favorite guy
Everyone's awed and inspired by you
And it's not very hard to see why
No one's slick as Garen
No one's quick as Garen
No one's neck's as incredibly thick as Garen's
For there's no man in town half as manly
Perfect, a pure paragon!
You can ask any Zed, Blitz or Annie
And they'll tell you whose team they prefer to be on
No one spins like Garen
No one wins like Garen
{{champion:79}}:
No one's got a swell cleft in his chin like Garen
{{champion:86}}:
As a specimen, yes, I'm intimidating!
{{champion:79}} and Chorus:
My what a guy, that Garen!
Give five "hurrahs!"
Give twelve "hip-hips!"
{{champion:79}}:
Garen is the best
And the rest is all Noxus
Chorus:
No one fights like Garen
Decisive Strikes like Garen
{{champion:79}}:
In a wrestling match nobody bites like Garen!
{{champion:133}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:44}} :
For there's no one as burly and brawny
{{champion:86}}:
As you see I've got biceps to spare
{{champion:79}}:
Not a bit of him's scraggly or scrawny
{{champion:86}}:
That's right!
And every last inch of me's covered with hair
Chorus:
No one hits like Garen
Deals Judgement like Garen
{{champion:79}}:
In a spinning match nobody spins like Garen
{{champion:86}}:
I'm especially good at executing!
Justice!
Chorus:
One kill for Garen!
{{champion:86}}:
When I was a lad played four dozen games
Every evening to help me get ranked
And now that I'm grown I play five dozen games
So I'm roughly the size of a tank!
Chorus:
Oh, ahhh, wow!
My what a guy, that Garen!
No one shoots like Garen
Wears those boots like Garen
{{champion:79}}:
Then goes tromping around killing noobs like Garen
{{champion:86}}:
I kill villains with all of my spinning justice!
Chorus:
My what a guy,
Garen!
I'm resisting the urge to proof-read your song lyrics because that would be rude, sadly ad libbing Disney songs is kinda my thing so it's a bit of an uncontrollable reflex...
am i the only one that sang the entire thing?
Hahaha, brilliant. Well done!
{{champion:267}}
Omg the little mermaid... my freaking nightmare of childhood...
I now want more songs
Plus 1 for my childhood.

Holy hell this forum is a fucking shadow of what it once was
I remember when a post like this would already have 80+ by now
:(
I miss the good old days

this is a top quality post btw
